tool_description: Get the population of the top 10 countries
name: Countries Population
title: Countries Population

api_list.name: Get top 10 countries
api_list.description: get the population top the 10 countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-population1.p.rapidapi.com/top-populated-countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-population1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-population1.p.rapidapi.com/top-populated-countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-population1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
